name: @cothema/nlp-model
description: Model for natural language processing (NLP) TypeScript packages.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run generate:barrels && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf dist && npm run generate:barrels && tsc --sourceMap -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.test: echo "Error: There are no tests for the model." && exit 1
scripts.test:cov: echo "Error: There are no tests for the model." && exit 1
scripts.test:watch: echo "Error: There are no tests for the model." && exit 1

author: Miloš Havlíček <havlicek@cothema.com>
